channel.title: Best way to free up Auxy storage space on my phone?
channel.description:
I’ve been using Auxy for about 4 years. Thus, I have quite a few tracks. 8 GB worth actually. Auxy takes up more space than anything else on my phone - by far.
What’s the best way to free up space besides the obvious - deleting tracks?
I’ve found several Auxy files for the same project under the “files” folder on my phone. Can these be deleted?
Thanks!

item.title: Best way to free up Auxy storage space on my phone?
item.dc:creator: HELIXX
item.source: Best way to free up Auxy storage space on my phone?

item.title: Best way to free up Auxy storage space on my phone?
item.dc:creator: lemonboy
item.description:
I think deleting the projects that you don’t use or no sounds or drums in it. Also maybe go with @AzureOnyx’s choice.

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to free up Auxy storage space on my phone?

item.title: Best way to free up Auxy storage space on my phone?
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
Other than exported tracks, your instruments/samples take up space too. Delete the instruments/samples you rarely use by swiping them to the left. If there’s a pack you don’t use, use can use the same gesture

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to free up Auxy storage space on my phone?

item.title: Best way to free up Auxy storage space on my phone?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Do you have a shed load of track renders? I suspect those will be taking up the most amount of space since the actual project files are very small

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to free up Auxy storage space on my phone?
